before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"h6df","text":"A. Sampling Section (Protocol optimized for freshly collected mussels)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nlbo","text":"Be sure to gather all materials before collecting mussels. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kqae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euta6","text":"B. Extraction of circulating cell-free DNA Section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmjm4","text":"1) Equilibrate samples to room temperature (15–25°C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o7np","text":"2) Equilibrate Buffer ATE to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gi6p","text":"3) Set a thermomixer or heated orbital incubator to 56°C for use in step #13.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ueka","text":"4) Ensure that buffers AW1 and AW2 have been prepared :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6mvs","text":"    a) Add 25 mL ethanol (100%) to the bottle containing 19 mL Buffer AW1 concentrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r1l9","text":"    b) Add 30 mL ethanol (100%) to the bottle containing 13 mL Buffer AW2 concentrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ue8h","text":"5) If Buffer AL or Buffer ATL contains precipitates, dissolve by heating to 70°C with gentle agitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r3jp","text":"6) Reconstitute carrier RNA by adding 310 µL of buffer ATE. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"beca4","text":"This protocol has been optimized for sampling hemolymph in sentinel mussels in remote areas, such as polar regions. A detailed protocol can be found in Caza et al. (2019).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":157,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":152,"length":18}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C1039F2BA92611ECB5830A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0223525"}}}}
keywords: Mussels, liquid biopsy, remote area, circulating cell-free DNA
manuscript_citation: Caza, F. et al. Liquid biopsies for omics-based analysis in sentinel mussels. PLoS One. 14, e0223525 (2019)
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8v9j1","text":"A. Sampling Section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6q2o","text":"1) Syringe (from 3 to 5 cc)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fe3r","text":"2) 25 gauge needle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0boi","text":"3) Sterile 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ld77","text":"4) Multi Spin Battery-Powered Mini-Centrifuge (3000 x g) or equivalent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di2r0","text":"5) Whatman 903™FTA cards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epb9t","text":"6) Plastic ziplock bags","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7fsp","text":"7) Silica gel desiccants (1gr/bag)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"agvml","text":"8) Pipette P200","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fatk8","text":"9) Sterilized filter tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsc2p","text":"10) Knife ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekl4e","text":"11) Ethanol 70%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e32vm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq9dr","text":"B. Extraction of circulating cell-free DNA Section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co3i8","text":"1) QIAamp DNA Investigator Kit (Qiagen - Cat #56504)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87meu","text":"2) Ethanol 100% ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6d0aq","text":"3) Sterile 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av629","text":"4) Pipettes (P1000, P100, P20, P2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73gs3","text":"5) Sterilized filter tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5cfvv","text":"Collect mussels (Mytilus spp.) with a shell length range between 50 to 70 mm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4uv5h","text":"Remove intervalvar liquid by opening gently the valves with the tip of a knife.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frvec","text":"Transfer immediately the hemolymph to a sterile 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube (Optional: You can pool 3 or 4 hemolymph samples to obtain a total volume of 1.5 mL per tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tnld","text":"Centrifuge for 3 minutes at maximum speed (approx. 3000 xg) at room temperature using a battery-powered mini-centrifuge (TOMY, Japan) or equivalent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":57,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alsoe","text":"After centrifugation, transfer the supernatant (clear solution above pellet at bottom of tube) in a new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube and gently resuspend the pellet. The pellets can be frozen (-20°C) or spotted on FTA cards until used use. Supernatants can also be frozen (-20°C) or spotted on FTA cards (using 70 µL aliquots) until use. We routinely use  Whatman 903™FTA cards with 13 mm discs to spot pellets or supernatants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":360,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tjib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11cpg","text":"Note : Once spotted, FTA cards are dried for 15 minutes at room temperature and stored individually in small ziplock plastic bags containing one silica gel desiccant moisture absorber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c93pk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pd8g","text":"Note : Unless otherwise indicated, hemolymph should be collected and processed within one hour after sampling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9b9v","text":"Unless otherwise indicated, you can use the QIAamp DNA Investigator Kit (Qiagen) for extraction of the hemolymphatic circulating cell-free DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":44,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":27}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"959FD285A92211ECB5830A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/human-id-and-forensics/investigator-solutions/qiaamp-dna-investigator-kit"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43l3i","text":"First, thaw frozen supernatants at room temperature and clarify by centrifugation for 10 minutes at 4500 xg at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":106,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1gbf","text":"Transfer 70 μL of the clarified supernatant into a new sterile 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pt5h","text":"Add 100 μL of buffer AL and 1 µL of reconstituted RNA Carrier (1µg/µL). Mix by pulse-vortexing for 15 seconds or until it is a homogeneous solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4kf7","text":"Add 30 µL of buffer ATL and 10 μL of proteinase K (\u003e600 mAU/mL) to the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sb19","text":"Incubate at 56°C for 10 minutes on a lab orbital shaker set at 900 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fgl3","text":"Add 50 μL of ethanol (100%) and mix thoroughly by pulse-vortexing for 15 seconds. Then, incubate for 3 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqv25","text":"Transfer the entire lysate from step #14 to the QIAamp MinElute column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eda0","text":"Centrifuge at 6000 x g for 1 minute. Place the QIAamp MinElute column in a clean 2 mL collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ovvm","text":"tube and discard the collection tube containing the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4110e","text":"Add 500 μL of buffer AW1 to the QIAamp MinElute column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3lj5f","text":"Repeat Step #16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27er0","text":"Add 700 μL of buffer AW2 to the QIAamp MinElute column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3nbvg","text":"Repeat Step #16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ci0lr","text":"Add 700 μL of ethanol (100%) to the QIAamp MinElute column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9c33p","text":"Repeat Step #16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7oh9t","text":"Centrifuge at full speed (20,000 x g) for 3 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30cd9","text":"Place the QIAamp MinElute column in a clean 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube and discard the collection tube containing the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8q4o1","text":"Open the lid and incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ldjn","text":"Apply 60 μL of buffer ATE to the center of the membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8j8is","text":"Close the lid and incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pflg","text":"Centrifuge at full speed (20,000 x g) for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7uc4h","text":"Discard the QIAamp MinElute column and keep the eluate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djugv","text":"Withdraw hemolymph from the adductor muscle using a syringe fitted with a 25G needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eifn5","text":"Bring the mussels back to their respective mussel bed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Liquid biopsy in sentinel mussels
